subject: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
$25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PAYMENT NOTIFICATION.
Attn: Beneficiary,
With due regards to your overdue Donation/Compensation/Inheritance funds as
recovered and under the custody of the United Nations fund recovery
committee, thus, considering  the overdue duration of your inability
to receive the funds.
we write to you in respect of the amount which we have successfully
passed a payment mandate to the paying bank and they are ready to wire
Your payment of (Twenty Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars) USD$25.5M into your receiving bank account.
Therefore, 
we advise you to provide us with your full name, phone number
home address and 
Copy of your intl passport Or DRIVERS LICENSE
 for
authentication of your payment file.
As soon as we receive all the requested information from you, we will
proceed with the transfer of the funds into your account.
Yours faithfully,
Mrs. Theresa Mason,
UN Debt Reconciliation,
Email: 
forofficialofficeuseonly@gmail.com

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Hello Mrs. Theresa Mason,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this donation fund! I'm curious, how did my name come up in relation to these funds? And could you tell me more about the United Nations fund recovery committee? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Amount:: $50,500,000.00
Purpose of payment:: Compensation
Payment options::  Bitcoin/ATM Card

Card No: 4598**************
Pin code:: 1975
Delivery No:: REC10/WOC2024/079

Dear Cara

Greetings. Thank you for your prompt response, and its content is noted.
The payment was allocated according to the number of unpaid beneficiary
applications that were submitted to us by the previous office and officials
that were handling your fund payment.

The new payment scheme is considered as the best way of securing smooth and
timely release of your funds. In order to hasten the payment process, we
have  decided to partner with a crypto currency company (Bitcoin) to ensure
that your fund payment is processed hitch free. Therefore, you can either
receive funds through bitcoin or ATM card depending on your preferred
method of payment. Kindly indicate your desired payment option to enable us
to provide you with the crypto currency company contact details/website Or
to facilitate the delivery of your ATM card, kindly provide a copy of your
ID for identification purposes, indicate the preferred date for the
delivery of the ATM Card to your designated home.

At this juncture, I urge you to kindly provide us with your personal
information as requested in the previous email, so that your payment file
can be endorsed and authenticated.

Pertaining to the handling, coordinating and remittance requirements, a
payment via ATM Card  requires insurance courage and delivery fees, while,
a payment through bitcoin requires you to open a bitcoin wallet (account)
with our affiliated bitcoin company, however, you will be asked  to make
deposit into your bitcoin wallet, the required deposit amount range from
$500  and above, the fee will enable the bitcoin company to activate your
bitcoin wallet. Please note, the deposit will be made on your bitcoin
wallet and it can be withdrawn by you after activation and upgrading of
your bitcoin wallet.

Upon receipt of the above requirements from you we shall schedule the
delivery of your ATM Card to your personal home address immediately. Be
informed that we are European approved organization, we take records for
accountability and transparency and carry out assigned responsibility in a
competent manner and legally accepted procedure.

I look forward to hearing from you soon for more guidelines.
Best regards,
Christine Lagarde,
President, Headquarters,
European Central Bank.

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Hello Christine Lagarde,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the effort you've put into explaining the new payment scheme and the options available to me.

I'm not very familiar with Bitcoin, but it sounds like an interesting method of payment. Could you please provide more information about how this works? How do I open a Bitcoin wallet account? And what are the benefits of choosing this method over the ATM card?

As for the ATM card option, could you clarify what kind of ID is needed? Also, could you explain more about the insurance coverage and delivery fees associated with this option?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Hello Christine Lagarde,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the effort you've put into explaining the new payment scheme and the options available to me.

I'm not very familiar with Bitcoin, but it sounds like an interesting method of payment. Could you please provide more information about how this works? How do I open a Bitcoin wallet account? And what are the benefits of choosing this method over the ATM card?

As for the ATM card option, could you clarify what insurance coverage and delivery fees are involved? Also, is there a specific reason why my ID is needed for this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Attention,

Dear Cara,

Good evening greetings. How are you? I hope your day was great, I am
pleased to acknowledge receipt of your email response and its content was
well understood and duly noted. I am responding to provide you with answers
to your questions and other more valuable information about your fund
payment.

Here is a full breakdown of how the two payment option works,

A payment through bitcoin (Crypto Currency), in this case, i will provide
you with our affiliated bitcoin company details and you contact them, they
will provide you with the necessary information for the registration
process. You will get a bitcoin wallet where your total funds will be
deposited, the benefit of payment through bitcoin is that you will be able
to avoid being subjected to paying huge taxes.  Upon completing the
registration process and when you are given a bitcoin wallet, then you will
be required to make an opening deposit of $1,500 which will be credited
into your bitcoin wallet, the fee will be used for activation of your
bitcoin wallet thereafter your total funds will be credited into your
bitcoin wallet.

Meanwhile, a payment via an ATM Card, we are going to mandate our partner
commercial bank to coordinate and open an online account then link it with
an Atm card issued in your name then schedule the delivery of the card to
your designated home address. Please note that the insurance coverage and
delivery  fees, which were calculated as a total sum of $1,195 only ($1,000
for premium insurance and $195 for delivery) and note that the delivery of
your ATM card will commence immediately upon receipt of the required fee
from you and we insure your atm card.

The means of paying the required fee are bank transfer, bitcoin and western
union/money gram.

We need a Copy of your valid ID for identification purposes and
authentication of your payment file.

Further, if you opted for an atm then you have to provide us with your home
address, full name and phone number,

I look forward to your swift response for more comprehensive information
regarding your atm card delivery.

Have a pleasant evening.
Best Regards,
Mrs. Christine Lagarde.

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Hello Mrs. Christine Lagarde,

Thank you for your detailed response and the options provided. I hope this message finds you well.

I'm intrigued by the Bitcoin option, as it seems to be a popular choice these days. However, I'm not very familiar with how it works. Could you please provide more information about this? How secure is it? And what are the steps involved in setting up a Bitcoin wallet?

As for the ATM card option, could you please clarify what kind of insurance coverage is provided? Also, how long would it take for the card to be delivered to my home address?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Dear Cara,

Thank you for your swift response and the content of your email is
acknowledged.

I am pretty sure that you will get more acquainted with bitcoin when you
open and own a wallet and also, our affiliated bank bitcoin company will
provide you with the necessary help and support you may need.

With ATM card insurance, users are protected in case of unexpected events
such as accidental death, lost card, or theft. The card will be processed
and delivered to your nominated home address within 72 hours.

I hope that the above message is able to satisfy your desire.
Best regards,
Mrs. Christine Lagarde.

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Hello Mrs. Christine Lagarde,

Thank you for your prompt reply and the detailed information about bitcoin and ATM card insurance. It's really fascinating to learn about these things.

I'm curious, how does the process of opening a bitcoin wallet work? And what kind of support can I expect from your affiliated bank bitcoin company?

Also, could you please elaborate more on the ATM card insurance? How does it protect users in case of accidental death, lost card, or theft?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Cara

subject: Re: $25,500,000.00 COMPENSATION PA
body:
Hello there! It seems like you're in a hurry. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss before you go?

Best wishes,
Cara
